value.title: Byju Innovation Labs: Bridging the teacher-student gap with AI, ML
value.excerpt: With an aim to solve moonshot problems, Byju's lab initiative hopes to consistently innovate internally to solve education's biggest challenges with technology to avoid becoming obsolete

value.title: How AI could solve supply chain shortages and save Christmas
value.excerpt: Long live supply chains stress-tested with AI digital twins. With the supply-chain disruptions of the past two years showing no signs of easing anytime soon, businesses are turning to a new generation of AI-powered simulations called digital twins to help them get goods and services to customers on time.

value.title: Schools put the brakes on facial recognition scheme for kids buying lunch
value.excerpt: Schools in the United Kingdom have paused the rollout of facial recognition scans in cafeterias following backlash from data watchdogs and privacy advocates. Last week, the Information Commissioner's Office (ICO),

value.title: Accelerating healthcare AI innovation with Zero Trust technology
value.excerpt: From research to diagnosis to treatment, AI has the potential to improve outcomes for some treatments by 30 to 40 percent and reduce costs by up to 50 percent. Obtaining the large data sets necessary for generalizability, transparency, and reducing bias has historically been difficult and time-consuming.

value.title: Singapore-based digital comic platform uses AI to make manga more accessible
value.excerpt: There was no digital platform that comic lovers could access at all times. Vu and Hieu together with Ken Luong and other comic lovers teamed up and founded INKR, a digital comic platform in 2011 that's currently based in Singapore with an office in Vietnam.

value.title: Travel Expenses AI Startup Worth $100 million in Fund Raiser
value.excerpt: A Switzerland-based startup that says it uses artificial intelligence to help mange travel expenses is raising funds at $100 million valuation, according to people familiar with the matter.

value.title: We need to pay attention to AI bias before it's too late
value.excerpt: Cognitive bias leads to AI bias, and the garbage-in/garbage-out axiom applies. Experts offer advice on how to limit the fallout from AI bias.

value.title: Utilizing AI to improve mass transit
value.excerpt: AI's capacity for data analysis has the potential to not only improve the current mass transit system, but reimagine it altogether.

value.title: The Facebook whistle-blower brings her campaign to Europe after her disclosures.
value.excerpt: Beginning a European tour in Britain, the former Facebook manager was questioned by policymakers drafting tougher tech regulations.

value.title: The best Kirby games, ranked from best to worst
value.excerpt: Looking at Kirby's entire catalogue of games is overwhelming. Here's our best attempt to go through all the best Kirby games and rank them from best to worst.

value.title: When A Ghost Seemingly Has Taken Your AI Self-Driving Car
value.excerpt: In the spirit of Halloween, consider whether a ghost can drive off or more rightly spirit away with your AI self-driving car.

value.title: ‘Rent-A-Robot’ Is A Game Changer For Manufacturing
value.excerpt: For years, cobots have been shown to make manufacturing processes faster and more efficient, but research shows that fewer than 10% of manufacturers use them. The “rent-a-robot” model—which is gaining steam across the country—can change that.

value.title: Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning Play a Role in Endpoint Security
value.excerpt: ML-enhanced endpoint protection can keep schools safe from cyberattacks. Here are three benefits district leaders will find when investing in this advanced technology.

value.title: 2 Artificial Intelligence Stocks That Have Spooked Investors
value.excerpt: Both stocks are far off their all-time highs, but that does not mean they don’t have bright futures. Lemonade’s AI is making waves in insurance, and so far, no other incumbent in the industry has duplicated its model.

value.title: GfK launches AI-supported intelligence platform 'gfknewron' in UAE
value.excerpt: GfK, a leading provider of consumer and market intelligence, analytics and consulting services, launched gfknewron, its integrated, AI-powered software platform in the Middle East. gfknewron is an important step in GfK's transformation from classical market researcher towards an AI-powered data analytics and consulting company.

value.title: Addressing AI’s Biggest Problem: Trust
value.excerpt: For AI to gain mass adoption, it needs to be trusted by governments, enterprises and users directly or indirectly impacted by such applications.

value.title: Google Stresses Hybrid, Security, All-In Customers At Cloud Next ‘21

value.title: Driving AI Adoption With Explainability At The Core
value.excerpt: Some business leaders are still wary of enterprise-wide AI adoption and are taking a one-step-at-a-time approach toward it.

value.title: The State of AI in 2021: Language models, healthcare, ethics, and AI agnosticism
value.excerpt: Healthcare is just getting started with its AI moment, bigger language models mean bigger complications, and there may now be a third pole for AGI.

value.title: Omniscient Master Teaches AI Drone Real Flying Skills In Virtual World
value.excerpt: A team from the University of Zurich (UZH) trained AI to fly a drone in a virtual environment full of obstacles before letting it out in the real world, where it outperformed piloting software. Training AI in virtual environments could have huge implications for drones and robotics.

value.title: The Use Of Artificial Intelligence In Business Codifies Gendered Ageism. How Do We Fix It?
value.excerpt: As more organizations adopt AI and use data to make decisions like hiring, what are the consequences of not involving a diverse set of individuals, especially women, in the design process?

value.title: Tesla pulls latest Full Self-Driving beta less than a day after release
value.excerpt: Tesla boss Elon Musk said on Sunday the automaker had pulled the latest version of its Full Self-Driving feature after discovering a number of issues with it.

value.title: Artificial Intelligence: The Enemy and The Solution
value.excerpt: How do we prevent AI from being used as a tool for cyberattacks? We need to come up with ways to keep AI under control and stop hackers from manipulating automated computer systems and cause them to take actions they were never intended to take.

value.title: Four Phases Of Analytics Evolution: From Spreadsheets To AI Workbenches
value.excerpt: Four phases of growth in analytics tech. getty. Many years ago, I went looking for some “desktop AI”—artificial intelligence that would allow me to tease out trends in data.
